description:
go/printer, gofmt: trim trailing whitespace in comments

Also: updated go fix testcases to pass tests.

Fixes issue 4310.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6810055/diff/3001/src/pkg/go/printer/printer.go
File src/pkg/go/printer/printer.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6810055/diff/3001/src/pkg/go/printer/printer.go#newcode458
src/pkg/go/printer/printer.go:458: // TODO(gri): Should this only trim Go "white space" (golang.org/ref/spec#Tokens)?
delete
i think this is fine but have no problem with deciding to trim only ' ' '\t' and maybe '\r' if it's still there.
this is not an important topic to waste too much thinking on.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=57768598a495 ***

go/printer, gofmt: trim trailing whitespace in comments

Also: updated go fix testcases to pass tests.

Fixes issue 4310.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6810055

done.

The submission also contains gofmt-ed test files used for go fix so that
all the tests pass.
- gri

On Tue, Oct 30, 2012 at 12:11 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> src/pkg/go/printer/printer.go:**458: // TODO(gri): Should this only trim
> Go "white space" (golang.org/ref/spec#Tokens)?
> delete
> i think this is fine but have no problem with deciding to trim only ' '
> '\t' and maybe '\r' if it's still there.
> this is not an important topic to waste too much thinking on.
>

subject: code review 6810055: go/printer, gofmt: trim trailing whitespace in comments
